EmailTemplate.name: 03-02-23 HOS Silver Essentials 5.11 GA Email.03-02-23 HOS Silver Essentials 5.11
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Silver Essentials 5.11 is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Our new update is live and ready to go so your point of sale can help you run your business even better. Silver Essentials 5.11 <[[https://docs.ncr.com/restaurant/silver-essentials/about/release_notes/version-5x/]]> includes: - Performance Enhancements  - Bug Fixes Running your business on the latest version of Silver Essentials ensures that you can rely on your POS to continue to perform at its best. Please upgrade for the best Essentials experience. Note: With this new release, the minimum supported version of Silver Essentials for Android is 5.10.  If you have automatic updates enabled, your system will update to the latest version automatically once it's available. If you don't have automatic updates enabled, you can update to 5.11 by tapping the “Upgrade” button from the cloud icon on the POS. <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
